attributes.action: Remove the Knighthood from Sir Bob Geldoff.
attributes.additional_details:
This is NOT the behaviour expected from someone with a GIVEN title. HE DOES NOT DESERVE IT. His recent foul mouthed attack follows the Brexit Flotilla attack!
https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/1286115/bizarre-brexit-boat-battle-breaks-out-between-nigel-farage-and-bob-geldof-on-the-river-thames/
attributes.background:
For reasons like this..
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-3701114/Fans-walk-festival-millionaire-singer-Bob-Geldof-launched-foul-mouthed-rant-wearing-Primark-clothes.html#v-2147455848142977572
He has proven to be unworthy of such a title.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
